metadata.name: Hemorage - The End
metadata.description:
This record is the band's first record and NFT. This is a collaboration with On-Chain Records. The song "The End" is about leaving everything behind and risking everything to follow our calling. It's about ending all ties to what is setting us back. 'For Your Life" is about the feeling of wanting revenge.

"The End" is a brand new song and "For Your Life" is a re-recording. We want to showcase the new version and the direction.

hemorage.net  
https://linktr.ee/hemorage

On-Chain Records aims to set the standard for digi-physical media and provide artists with the tools, resources and support to experiment and push the limits of music. Each release from On-Chain Records is securely linked to a smart contract via a Kong NFC chip. Embedding a Kong chip into a physical item transforms it into a cryptoasset that can be verified on chain (using your smartphone), as well as interacted with in real life.

Linking the physical records to the blockchain allows for users to interact with the record both digitally and physically. Each record is jam packed with digital features and Easter eggs.

For more information, visit https://tell.ie/on-chainrecords
